Package server.sharedRegions

Class Plane

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
server.sharedRegions.Plane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Plane
extends java.lang.Thread
Plane. It is responsible to keep a continuously updated account of the passengers inside the plane and is implemented as an implicit monitor. All public methods are executed in mutual exclusion. There are four internal synchronization points: two single blocking point for the pilot, one where he waits for the signal that all passengers have entered the plane and another where he waits for all passengers to leave the plane; one an array of blocking points, one per each passenger, where he waits for the plane to arrive at the destination airport; and one single blocking point for the hostess, where she waits for all the passengers to enter the plane to tell the pilot. where cutting chair while having his hair cut.

  • Method Details

    • boardThePlane

      public void boardThePlane()
      Operation board the plane. It is called by a passenger when he has permission to enter the plane.

    • waitForAllInBoard

      public void waitForAllInBoard()
      Operation wait for all in board. It is called by the pilot after he signals that the plane is ready for boarding. The pilot waits for all the passengers to enter the plane.

    • informPlaneReadyToTakeOff

      public void informPlaneReadyToTakeOff​(int nboarded)
      Operation inform plane ready to take off. It is called by the hostess after every passenger entering the plane.
      Parameters:
      nboarded - number of people that boarded the plane

    • flyToDestinationPoint

      public void flyToDestinationPoint()
      Operation fly to destination point. It is called by the pilot to fly to the destination airport.

    • announceArrival

      public void announceArrival()
      Operation announce arrival. It is called by the pilot when he arrives at the destination airport.

    • leaveThePlane

      public void leaveThePlane()
      Operation leave the plane. It is called by the passenger to leave the plane.

    • lastPrint

      public void lastPrint()
      Operation last print. It is called by the pilot in the end to print the last information lines of the logger file.

    • shutdown

      public void shutdown()
      Operation server shutdown. New operation.
